sentences.sContent: It’s going to take us months to clear the backlog .
sentences.sCn: 我们得花好几个月才能处理完积压未办的事情。

synos.tran: [管理]积压的工作；积压待办的事务；大木材

trans.tranCn: [管理] 积压的工作；积压待办的事务；大木材
trans.tranOther: a large amount of work that you need to complete, especially work that should already have been completed
